description: Provides a common Caltech Library CL JavaScript object
name: cl-js
releaseNotes:
v1 of CL-js is the first version written in TypeScript to support feeds.library.caltech.edu >= 1.6. The user interface components, e.g. BuilderWidget and CL-feeds-ui.js
have been migrated to web components and implemented as part of CL-web-component project. With v1 release of CL-js two platforms are targeted, ES6 friendly evergreen web browsers and Deno.
